scripts.pretest: set NODE_ENV=test && npx sequelize-cli db:drop --env=test --config ./database/config/database.config.js && npx sequelize-cli db:create --env=test --config ./database/config/database.config.js && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env=test --config ./database/config/database.config.js --migrations-path ./database/migrations && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --env=test --seeders-path ./database/seeders/test --config ./database/config/database.config.js
scripts.test: set NODE_ENV=test && nyc --reporter lcov --reporter text mocha --recursive --timeout 5000 --exit
